briefTitle: Safety Study of Levocetirizine Oral Solution for Japanese Pediatrics
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Open-labelled Study to Evaluate the Safety of Levocetirizine Hydrochloride Oral Solution in Children Aged 6 Months to 2 Years With Allergic Rhinitis or Pruritus Associated With the Skin Diseases.
summary: To evaluate the safety of treatment with levocetirizine oral solution in pediatric patients aged form 6 months to 2 years old with allergic rhinitis or pruritus associated with the skin diseases.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) and Non-serious Adverse Events (AEs)
